I think I have just the right fit for you! Have you considered "Maleficent"? This fantasy drama stars Angelina Jolie Pitt in a powerful performance as a vengeful fairy, and its themes of good vs. evil could really resonate with you. Plus, it's got stunning visuals and an epic score to boot!

Alternatively, if you're in the mood for something a bit more complex and character-driven, I'd recommend "Eve's Bayou". This critically-acclaimed drama explores the intricate relationships within an affluent African-American family, featuring a talented ensemble cast including Lynn Whitfield, Jurnee Smollett-Bell, and Diahann Carroll.

With its thrilling action sequences and thought-provoking themes, I think you'll find this movie quite captivating!
